publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1410# Ms Sandra White: Increasing Gender Pay Gap-That the Parliament notes with concern the result of research by PayFinder.com which indicates that the gender pay gap is getting wider, that it has increased by 5% in the last year and that the gap is now 29% in Scotland and believes that this is an unacceptable situation and that the Scottish Executive has a duty to investigate the matter and bring forward proposals to close the gap.
